General.Name: Ningbo Baosi Energy Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo BaoSi Energy Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in production and sale of high-end precision parts and sets of equipment in China and internationally. It offers compressors, precision parts, vacuum and hydraulic pumps, precision cutting tools, and precision transmission parts. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Fenghua, China.
